game.name: Restaurats
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 중세 레스토랑을 쥐들과 운영하자! 요리하고 손님에게 던지고, 전설의 쥐 셰프가 되어라!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead a medieval restaurant with a team of rats like you! Cook the food, throw it at the guests, wipe the drinks under the skeletons! Become a legendary rat chef, proving to orcs and vampires that the most delicious bloody meat is served in your restaurant!

reviewHighlights.text: I love playing this game with my friends but it KILLS ME to see AI generated slop all over, especially as a graphic artist. Hopefully with the money t...
Game is fine overall, but there's a MAGA hat and that makes me not want to engage with this game.
